00010 W.control('WFCKeditor')

00012 
00013 
00014 <script type='text/javascript'>
00015 var timer = new W.Timer;
00016 timer.start();
00017 
00018 var BasePath = '/workspace_framework/wednus_proj/control/WFCKeditor/FCKeditor/';
00019 var Value = 'This is some <strong>sample text<\/strong>. You are using *<a href="http://wednus.com">wednus</a>ified* <a href="http://www.fckeditor.net/">FCKeditor<\/a>.' ;
00020 var fck = new W.WFCKeditor('FCKeditor1', BasePath, Value);
00021 // add wps property
00022 fck.wps = '80%,80%,xcenter:0,ycenter:0';
00023 
00024 function finish(){
00025     timer.pause();
00026     W.test('If you can see an FCKeditor in the middle of your browser, press OK.', 'WFCKeditor, the constructor');
00027     W.test('Try to resize the browser, does the editor reposition/resize itself automatically?', 'wednusify user control');
00028     timer.resume();
00029     timer.finish();
00030 }
00031 //W.run(finish);
00032 </script>
